revision.text:
{{cleanup}} '''Upheaval''', a wad created by [[User:Pure Hellspawn|Pure Hellspawn]] for version 2.0.96, uses ACS Scripting and DECORATE and all those other terms that I don't have any idea what they mean yet I know enough to program them.
This wad is going to be big hopefully so right now it's 1-2 to 33% done. I currently have 1 map
Progress can be seen at www.freewebs.com/mydoompage and clicking on Doom Projects.
http://www.freewebs.com/mydoompage/Projects/2roomstart.wad
Click this link to see two rooms. Every single room in this wad will have scripting.
Credits go to whomever made the Monster Resource wad, [[User:DomRem|DomRem]] (for answering my questions), [[User:CodeImp|CodeImp]] (for Doom Builder), [[Randy Heit]] (for ZDoom and this page), Linguica (for Doomworld), ID Software (for DOOM), and Pure Hellspawn (for actually building this level and naming it, scripting it).
Now for Progress:
Map 1 is done!!
Project is on hold (but not abandoned) at the moment. I have quite a few other important issues I must deal with. Sorry for the inconvience. [[Category:Abandoned ZDoom Projects]]
